name: vgurad
description: vGuard is a full-stack application designed to help farmers and agricultural professionals identify and manage crop diseases effectively. The platform leverages AI-powered image recognition to detect diseases from crop images, provides a comprehensive database of crop diseases, and offers expert advice and agricultural tips.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:prod: npm install --omit=dev --prefix backend && npm install --omit=dev --prefix frontend
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run install:prod
